document_data.name: ''Potion of Spell Enhancement''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''potion of spell enhancement''''' was a [[potion]] that increased the power of the caster's spells.
document_data.Powers: When a [[mage]] consumed such a [[potion]], the spells they cast became much more powerful. This potion, however, only lasted for a short duration.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], a chamber to the southwest of [[Leilon]] was highly guarded by [[undead]] such as [[spectre]]s and [[wight]]s . The undead guardians appeared to be protecting a potent ''potion of spell enhancement''.
